data.title: Mélodisorientations
data.meta_description:
Mélodisorientations by Guillaume Tiberghien, released 23 May 2020

1. Saviour
2. Dark Sky Night
3. Oh I See
4. Encore et Encore
5. Conveniently At Your Door
6. Interlude
7. Mélodisorientation
8. Mighty Gifts
9. If I could
10. Mama Sate
11. Into the Blue

This album is the most intimate and honest reflection of the past 4 years spent in this beautiful region of Scotland, Dumfries and Galloway. 

I was accompanied by wonderful musicians from the region who gave a very creative and colourful flavour to the music. 

Enjoy!
data.text:
1.

Saviour 04:16

Saviour You are my saviour Coming along For the joy, the laughter Where I belong You are my saviour I feel it so strong For you, for the laughter Where you belong And I know, it won’t be long Caus’ in the shade of the day I guess somewhat things would never be the same Oh embrace A love of faith And I’ll meet you down there You know where I can hear The lovely bells Caus’ you are my angel You are my angel Caus’ you are my saviour I know you I am sure With you, for the laughter Oh I want you, adore And I know… Caus’ in the shade of the day I guess somewhat things would never be the same Oh I am brave For a love of faith And I’ll meet you down here You know where Before you disappear In the shade Papapapapa… Caus’ in the shade of the day I guess somewhat things would never be the same Oh embrace A love of faith And I’ll meet you down there You know where I can hear The lovely bells Caus’ you are my angel Yes you are my angel

2.

Dark Sky Night 03:43

Dark Sky Night Dark Sky Night In my mind Where to find The Love Feel the fire Feel the heat Slowly trying to disappear You said once Leave me The Dark Sky Night Dark Sky Night In my mind Here to find The Love Feel the fire Feel the heat Slowly trying to disappear Wish I was That bright In the Dark Sky Night

Oh I See 04:35

Oh I see You said love to set me free You said love is all around me You said love is the key You said love You said love Comes and goes You said I know How to make you glow You said come on Let it show You said love But it seems You are Keeping your heart asleep Oh it seems You are, you are Oh it seems you are Running inside your dreams As you are so Sorry, oh yes I see So sorry You said Come on love me more I’m shaking From the bones to the core A broken heart that feels no more Shying away From what I used to care for So please stay close I’m falling on the ground Oh please stay close to me Oh please release me From all this chaos around I’m falling, I’m falling to The ground Please stay close I love you all Please come closer And stay around Please stay close I love you all Please come closer And I’ll leave it all behind

4.

Encore et Encore 04:09

Encore et encore Il me revient Encore et encore Une étincelle Je me remémore Un peu plus loin Au-delà du nord Un autre espace Celui du réconfort Du réconfort Je te retiens Encore et encore Car je sais bien Qu’il n’est point de remords Oh cette vie A prendre à bras le corps Oh cette envie Qui trop souvent nous mord Trop souvent nous tord Et je me dresse Encore et encore Encore un tout Tout petit effort Oui je me dresse Encore et encore Car je sais bien… Je me souviens Encore et encore De nos envies De ces cœurs à corps De cette vie Du sud au grand nord Un parti pris Pour nos petites morts Nos petites morts Et je me dresse Encore et encore Encore un tout Tout petit effort Oui je me dresse Encore et encore Car je sais bien… Il me revient Encore et encore Cette étincelle Je me remémore Un peu plus fort Que tous les coups du sort Un autre espace Oui je me dresse Encore et encore Encore un tout Tout petit effort

Conveniently At Your Door 04:06

Conveniently at your door Looking back at things From the edge of a deep green sea I’d rather lie down and think Of me and you Joyfully setting through Along the harbour view I’d rather come back indeed And be with you I really don’t know Looking at the show I wonder if I could breathe Under the water And see memories unfold Unchained to my knees As I’m trying desperately to crawl Oh simple things always win As I’m feeling deeply entwined In something I can’t control Overwhelming my soul Looking back at things Instantly It feels like taking me Into another Stage of patience I though I was meant to meet A little piece of you Hidden in silence Oh simple things always win As I’m feeling deeply entwined In something I can’t control Overwhelming my soul Bridge Conveniently at your door Yes I am really sure What is worth looking for Conveniently at your door Conveniently at your door What if it meant so much more? Conveniently at your door What was worth looking for What is worth looking for

Mélodisorientation Ma mélodisorientation Ma mélodie Ma mélodisorientation Oh mélodie Disorient me Overwhelm me Oh Invade me Come and find me Come and find me All around me Oh it seems That you are here Oh it feels That I can’t breath Oh it seems That you are here As I stand still (x2) Ma mélodisorientation Ma mélodie Ma mélodisorientation Oh mélodie Oh it seems That you are here Oh it feels That I can’t breath Oh it seems You are here As I stand still (X2) Ma mélodisorientation Ma mélodie Ma mélodisorientation Oh mélodie Come and find me Overwhelm me Disorient me All around me Come and find me Overwhelm me Disorient me All around me

Mighty Gifts 03:36

Mighty gifts Rooting Enjoying my time I think I am finding All my colours back again A bit of uncertainty But feeling lucky Everyday is a blessing Having you around A sort of homecoming Will I see you again? Find the time to (Re)discover you and me my friends It’s been a long time So long to see Years of wondering How it could ever be But I rooted down here Oh gravity Is pushing on me In a cycle of joy and fear Rooting Enjoying my time And I am wondering Are you really all mine? A bit of sympathy But I am not so blind It’s about who we are And what we are meant to be It’s been a long time So long to see Years of wondering About things that ought to be And I rooted down here Oh gravity Is pushing on me In a cycle of joy and fear And I won’t forget I’ll be there to set This rocky lift With all of us My mighty gifts Yes I’ll be there to feel The light From all of us With joy and cheer My mighty gifts With joy and cheer My mighty gifts With joy and cheer My mighty gifts

If I could 02:55

If I could I wish I could flow Rhythm between I wish I could blow My layers within Underneath my skin Underneath Over and over Cycles of war Down under Your call For many more Battles to the core To the core If I could Let it go If I could Change it all If I could If I could Would you let me know Would you let me? I wish I could mellow My layers within I wish I could float My body breathing Time to save it all Time to save it Underneath Underneath my skin The truth within Colours shaping Underneath my skin Underneath If I could Let it go If I could Change it all If I could If I could Would you let me know Would you let me? If I could Change it all If I could Just let it go If I could If I could Would you let me know Would you let me? Underneath my skim It burns It burns Underneath my skin To the core To the core Underneath my skim It burns It burns Underneath my skin To the core To the core Underneath

Mama Sate 03:30

Mama Sate Yes I could not resist My heart Just like a twist Calling you On the other side Of the world A very special call A very special time Falling into love And tears Washing away My heart-break feel Yes, I could not resist The temptation Calling me Right at the bottom Of my soul Of my soul Yes I could not resist My heart Just like a twist Calling you Oh I know I would always need you My love Here and now Yes, I could not resist The temptation Calling me Right at the bottom Of my soul Of my soul

Into the Blue 04:24
